title: How to Make a Vegetarian Taco Pie

steps.headline: Mix the flour, salt and baking powder with the butter to form a dough.
steps.description: Roll the dough out flat, slightly wider than the shape of the pie or baking pan. If you're using pre-made dough, skip this step.

steps.headline: Put the dough into a baking pan with high edges.
steps.description: Form the dough or pastry to the shape of the baking pan or dish by pressing it up the sides and gently across the base.

steps.headline: Peel and dice the onions and carrots.
Tip oil into the frying pan.
steps.description: Add the vegetarian mince, garlic, onion, carrots and fry until softened. Do not allow to overcook.

steps.headline: Add the taco spice mix and the water.
Let the mixture fry until the water has almost gone.
Transfer the fried vegetarian mince filling to the dough base in the baking pan.
Slice the tomatoes into thin rounds.
steps.description: Put the sliced tomatoes across the top of the vegetarian mince filling.

steps.headline: Mix the crème fraîche, mayonnaise and grated cheese together.
Spread this mix over the top of the tomatoes and vegetarian mince filling.

parts.name: Baking and serving the taco pie

steps.headline: Bake in the oven for 35 minutes.
steps.description: When the top is nicely golden or slightly browned, it's ready to serve.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Cut into pie wedges and place on serving plates. Serve with steamed vegetables, nachos or a salad.

text: Preparing the dough Mix the flour, salt and baking powder with the butter to form a dough. Roll the dough out flat, slightly wider than the shape of the pie or baking pan. If you're using pre-made dough, skip this step. Put the dough into a baking pan with high edges. Form the dough or pastry to the shape of the baking pan or dish by pressing it up the sides and gently across the base. Making the vegetarian mince filling Peel and dice the onions and carrots.  Tip oil into the frying pan. Add the vegetarian mince, garlic, onion, carrots and fry until softened. Do not allow to overcook. Add the taco spice mix and the water. Mix together until well combined. Let the mixture fry until the water has almost gone.  Assembling the taco pie Transfer the fried vegetarian mince filling to the dough base in the baking pan.  Slice the tomatoes into thin rounds. Put the sliced tomatoes across the top of the vegetarian mince filling. Mix the crème fraîche, mayonnaise and grated cheese together.  Spread this mix over the top of the tomatoes and vegetarian mince filling. This serves as the topping. Baking and serving the taco pie Bake in the oven for 35 minutes. When the top is nicely golden or slightly browned, it's ready to serve. Serve. Cut into pie wedges and place on serving plates. Serve with steamed vegetables, nachos or a salad.
